title: Expanded View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing the scores page scoreboard
AND the scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the videos carousel for a game that is LIVE or FINAL
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the Game Story content first in the carousel
AND the Game Story is tappable

title: Logos and Colors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a game's scoreboard
AND the game is Final
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the video carousel 
AND sees Game Story content displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the Game Story thumbnail will have the AWAY team on top-left
AND the home team logo will be displayed bottom-right
AND the team's colors will be their background

title: Open Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a live or final game's scoreboard
AND a Game Story is available
custom_steps: WHEN the user views each game on the scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the scoreboard should show a link with other gameday links that opens a game story

title: Scrolling
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a game's video carousel on the scores page 
AND there is a Game Story available
custom_steps: WHEN the users scrolls (swipes) through the carousel
custom_expected: THEN the scrolling should be smooth and not get stuck at any point

title: Team Snapshot Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a team page
AND is viewing the Team Snapshot at the top of the page
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the links displayed in the snapshot
custom_expected: THEN a Game Story link will be available to view as a context item

title: Game Story deep link
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open up Game Story through a deep link
custom_steps: WHEN the user edits mlbatbat://gamestory?id={GAMESTORYID} with a valid ID
custom_expected: THEN the Game Story will be opened in a modal

title: Invalid Game Story
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open up Game Story through a deep link
custom_steps: WHEN mlbatbat://gamestory?id={GAMESTORYID} is edited with an invalid ID
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an error message displayed in the invalid Game Story modal

title: ES Supported Language
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wishes to open up a Game Story deep link in Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN the user adds ES to the supported languages in the config
custom_expected: THEN the Game Story modal with a valid ID mlbatbat://gamestory?id={GAMESTORYID} , will open in Spanish

title: Invalid Game Story  (ES)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wishes to open up a Game Story deep link
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adds ES as a supported language in the config
AND the user adds an invalid ID to  mlbatbat://gamestory?id={GAMESTORYID}
custom_expected: THEN the error message displayed in the modal will be in Spanish

title: First Story - Teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the first slide in the Story
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the away team logo (w-l) over the home team logo (w-l)
AND the Location of the game (Ballpark, city, State) will be displayed on the bottom-right

title: Mute/Unmute
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the slides to the Game Story
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to tap on the icon to mute/unmute the feed
AND the user will either see sound on/sound off when tapped

title: Share Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the slides in the Game Story
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to tap on the share icon 
AND the share drawer opens up with destinations for the user to utilize
AND the user is able to X out and playback resumes.

title: Tapping Through Story
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the Game Story slides
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to tap on the right side of the screen to go forward in the Game Story
AND the user is able to tap on the left side of the screen to go backwards in the Game Story
AND tapping quickly will not cause the app to crash
AND tapping on the left at the first slide OR right on the last slide does not cause the Game Story modal to close

title: Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a slide in the Game Story
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Team banner of whose highlight is playing 
AND the inning, score (away above home), and result of at-bat displayed to the right of the team banner
AND a line break is displayed above the title of the highlight in the slide EX: Avisail Garcia's RBI Single
AND the Batter and Pitcher will be displayed below the highlight title
AND the date will be displayed to the right of the pitcher name
AND the Game Story icon along with MLB Game Story Presented by will be displayed along with the sponsor 
AND the logo will be presented on thee bottom-right of the slide

title: Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user is tapping through the Game Story
custom_expected:
THEN after about 4-5 slides, the user will see an AD
AND the ad can be skipped by tapping back or forward in the modal

title: Swiping & Holding
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes left to right, or right to left on the slide
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the icons displaying the areas on the screen where the user can Tap Back or Tap Next

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user holds their finger down on the screen
WHEN the user lets go of holding down on the screen

title: Exiting
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened up the Game Story Modal from a PN, Game Link, Video Carousel, or Team Page Snapshot
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the X on the top-left of the page 
OR the user swipes down on the screen
custom_expected: THEN the Story will close and the user will be taken to the previous page
